The imagery on a New Leadership PAC web: 2. The introduction of the New Leadership PAC in an October 2017 press release, stating that resolutions demanding changes in House leadership were passed by 54 Republican party county chapters, representing over 50 percent of Texas Republican voters.
The email response from the PAC: s treasurer, Don Dyer, providing a document listing 56 counties that voted to oust Speaker Joe Straus.
Interviews with local party officials: news stories, and web posts by county parties and Empower Texans, showing that anti-Straus resolutions were approved by executive committees of Republican parties in 19 counties, including the eight counties with the highest turnouts in the state's latest GOP primary.
